name: Tabs.Root

onValueChange.description: A callback function called when the active tab value changes.
onValueChange.description_zh: A callback function called when the active tab value changes.

activateOnFocus.description: Whether or not to activate the tab when it receives focus.
activateOnFocus.description_zh: Whether or not to activate the tab when it receives focus.

autoSet.description: Whether or not to automatically set the tab value when it receives focus.
autoSet.description_zh: Whether or not to automatically set the tab value when it receives focus.

loop.description: Whether or not the tabs should loop when navigating with the keyboard.
loop.description_zh: Whether or not the tabs should loop when navigating with the keyboard.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root tabs component which contains the other tab components.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
